title: Tesla, Merck, Moderna: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Tesla reported record deliveries in the third quarter; Merck shares were extending gains from last week
body:
Stock futures edged down as investors kept on eye on the multiple quarrels over government spending taking place on Capitol Hill. Here’s what we’re watching before Monday’s trading begins.
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
